io.jeo.mongo

Class DefaultMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.mongo.DefaultMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MongoMapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoJSONMapper

    public class DefaultMapper
extends Object
implements MongoMapper
    Default mapper that uses a Mapping instance to map mongo objects to features.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo
